name: Chain Tower
description:
You're a princess trapped in a tower with a dragon... But this time, there is not a blue knight coming to help!

You must escape by yourself, maybe going down these chains is a good idea...

But the dragon is chasing after you! With its fire breath! Escape, quickly!

------------------------------

This game was developed for Devs al Asador Game Jam, with the theme "Cadena" (Chain) and two weeks of time.

------------------------------

Game by NeuroticToast (a.k.a. definetly not Asdonaur)

Music from the Infinity Crystal Music Pack, by Sara Garrard.
